title: Regret, Uncertainty, and Bounded Rationality in Norm-Driven Decisions
summary: This study introduces an agent-based model to study how regret, uncertainty, and social norms interact to shape vaccination behavior during epidemics. The model integrates three behavioral mechanisms, anticipated regret, evolving norms, and uncertainty-dependent trust, within a unified learning framework.
